Desc.entry: Aims to campaign on local issues of importance to those who live and work in Broomhill, in particular to secure high standards in planning and development and enhance the Broomhill Conservation Area, to promote understanding and appreciation of the area's character, including its history, social and economic background and the way in which such factors have shaped the area, to preserve and enhance the distinctive features that characterise Broomhill Conservation Area and to work for the improvement or replacement of features that detract from it, to maintain and where possible improve the environment and quality of life in Broomhill and promote community cohesion.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 2nd Tues in the month at 7.30pm (meetings open to members and non-members)
